name: callAsyncJavaScript(_:arguments:in:in:completionHandler:)
desc: Executes the specified string as an asynchronous JavaScript function.
declaration: @MainActor func callAsyncJavaScript(_ functionBody: String, arguments: [String : Any] = [:], in frame: WKFrameInfo? = nil, in contentWorld: WKContentWorld, completionHandler: ((Result<Any, Error>) -> Void)? = nil)
